headline: BofA lifts Valero rating on heavy crude advantage but downgrade Phillips 66
summary: Investing.com -- Bank of America upgraded Valero Energy to Buy from Neutral, saying the refiner stands to benefit most from an expected widening in the price gap between light and heavy crude over the next year.

headline: Goldman Sachs Picks 2 New Stocks. They’re Bets on a Weak Economy.
summary: The investment bank also added Valero Energy and Cadence Design Systems to its list of favorite stocks.
